circumstances: Shortly after takeoff from Jacobina Airport, while in initial climb, the left engine lost power. The crew initiated a sharp turn to the left when the aircraft lost height, struck an electric pole and crashed near the runway end. The aircraft was destroyed and all four occupants were killed.
probable_cause:
The following findings were identified:
- Poor crew training, 
- Pool fuel consumption calculation on part of the crew, 
- Wrong crew's decision to fly on one engine,
- Inappropriate of aircraft controls, 
- Poor crew coordination, 
- Poor flight planning.
